title: 3bedroom x 1bath Available Soon! $1,295
posting_body: ['Call and see your next home!', 'Schedule a tour here: <URL>', "Located just minutes from the Las Vegas Strip, you'll be at the center of it all here at Greenville", 'Park!', 'Our warm and inviting apartment community is set amongst a beautifully landscaped', 'setting and surrounded by every imaginable recreation available.', 'World-class shopping,', 'wonderful dining, local schools, commuter-friendly freeways and exciting recreations are all just', 'minutes away.', 'With unique two and three bedroom floor plans, you’re sure to find the ideal apartment for your', 'needs here.', 'All of our apartments come equipped with an array of highly desirable amenities,', 'including central air conditioning, spacious walk-in closets, a state of the art kitchen with modern', 'appliances and more!', '● Central Air', '● Refrigerator', '● Laundry facilities', '● Swimming Pools', 'Location: 3820 Pennwood Ave.', 'Las Vegas, NV 89102', 'Rental Information: CALL FOR UP-TO-DATE AVAILABILITY!', '1 BR/1 BA $760', '2 BR/1 BA $795-$860', '2 BR/2 BA $910', '3 BR/2 BA $1060', 'Application Fee: $55* | Lease Terms: 12 months *A $250.00 holding fee applies to secure a unit', 'of the requested size upon approval.', 'Holding deposits are applied to move-in charges once the', 'application is approved, otherwise the holding fee is non-refundable.', 'Additional details available', 'on application.', '<URL>/', 'Westland Real Estate Group is a family-owned company that features 30 multi-family', 'communities throughout Las Vegas.', 'With over 10,000 units in the area, we offer everything from', 'studios to three-bedroom townhomes, with a variety of in-demand amenities.', 'Enjoy stress-free', 'living in our well-maintained communities with clean grounds and professional staff.', 'At', 'Westland, you’ve found a place where you can invest in your future.']
